response.overview: In this interview with a professional proctologist, we take a closer look at something we all do but rarely discuss — poop.  Dr. Maryana Abritsova explains how to prevent common rectal diseases, what people get wrong about bowel habits, and how to sit, strain, and stay healthy.  It’s funny, awkward, and surprisingly educational — a crash course in the art and science of healthy pooping.
response.tagline: The science of poop — explained by a real doctor.
response.title: A Proctologist on How to Poop Properly
